article_title: License To Launder: As Bal Harbour police chief, Tom Hunker was a larger than life figure who brought in millions
article_text:
Hunker is at the center of what could become Florida’s largest undercover corruption case in decades

His task force handed hundreds of thousands over to informants in cash and even more was withdrawn from bank accounts with no records

“You could see how powerful he was getting,” said Patricia Cohen, Bal Harbour deputy mayor.

article_metadata.title: License To Launder: As Bal Harbour police chief, Tom Hunker was a larger than life figure who brought in millions | Miami Herald

og.description: Just days after his undercover police flouted state law by using drug cash to pay their informants, Bal Harbour Chief Tom Hunker hosted dozens of police chiefs at the elegant Sea View Hotel, complete with dinner, an open bar and a $500-a-night cigar roller.
